categories: Category:Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game

nodes.text: The Price of Victory is the seventh expansion and eighth set overall of the Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game. Released on December 14, 2010, The Price of Victory is set during the events of Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back, in order to commemorate the 30th anniversary of the film. It adds over 175 new playing cards and more than 20 new loot cards, as well as two new avatar races: Devaronians and Selonians. Additionally, two new keywords are added: Versatile and Entanglement. The ten-scenario story arc takes players through the events of The Empire Strikes Back, from the Battle of Hoth to Cloud City, along with a mission to the Star Destroyer Tyrant.
